documentation.text:
@dev  return staker's reward percentage in precision for the current epoch
       reward percentage is not finalized until the current epoch is ended

attributes.text:
@dev  return staker's reward percentage in precision for the current epoch
       reward percentage is not finalized until the current epoch is ended

getCurrentEpochRewardPercentageInPrecisi.details: return staker's reward percentage in precision for the current epoch       reward percentage is not finalized until the current epoch is ended

getPastEpochRewardPercentageInPrecision(.details: return staker's reward percentage in precision for a past epoch only       fee handler should call this function when a staker wants to claim reward       return 0 if staker has no votes or stakes
